title: Vue 2.5 released
body: We are excited to announce the release of Vue 2.5 Level E! This release includes improvements of various features

title: New Route Methods introduced in Laravel 5.5
body: A convenient shortcuts to the Laravel Router class that eliminates the need for creating a controller or closure only to return a simple view or redirect

title: Lucid 4.1.0 Breaking Change
body: A minor release of Lucid from 4.0.25 to 4.1.0 has been published and contains breaking changes.

title: Bulma is on Patreon!
body: This will allow people to easily support Bulma, and ensure its future development.
